name: Flower Quest
description:
Flower Quest

Explore the Magical Caves in this whimsical Metroidvania puzzler! Complete with minigames and all the flower growing you can handle!

  • Move - Arrow Keys / WASD
  • Action - Space / Z
  • Restart (when in a puzzle room) - R

(Press Down to plant seeds at your feet)

Credits:

  • Design / Programming / Art - TheJaspel - Twitch- Itch
  • Music - BinaryCounter - Twitch- Itch
